text:
Classification for *well_maintained:
- Maintenance score ≥8/10
- No visible damage or litter
- Landscaping updated within last 3 months

Criteria for *needs_attention:
- Maintenance score ≤4/10
- Visible damage or hazards
- No landscaping updates in past year

*large_park definition:
- Area ≥50,000 sq.ft
- Contains multiple facilities
- Serves multiple neighborhoods

*spacious green spaces:
- ≥20m² per capita
- Open sight lines
- Low visitor density (<0.5 people/10m²)

*crowded areas:
- <5m² per capita
- Visitor density >2 people/10m²
- Frequent congestion points

*many_parks qualification:
- ≥3 green spaces within 500m radius
- Combined area ≥15,000 sq.ft
- Varied park types
